ability.Heavenly Speed: Doubles the user's Speed during the first 5 turns of battle.
ability.Divine Flight: Grants immunity to Ground-type moves and raises evasion by 20%.

Skybound Rush.effect: Has a 20% chance to increase the user's Speed by 1 stage.

Jade Strike.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target dizzy, 50% chance to fall asleep in the next turn.

Celestial Barrier.effect: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 2 stages.
